KAMUX.HE.summary: Kamux Oyj engages in the retail and wholesale of used cars and integrated services through showrooms and website. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 48 showrooms in Finland; 17 showrooms in Sweden; and 6 showrooms in Germany. It also offers financing and insurance products to its customers; and sells used cars in auctions. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in HÃ¤meenlinna, Finland.
